resources.string: \'Added on\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy \'at\' HH:mm
Tap for admin access to settings
Census database is successfully backed up to %1$s
Error while backing up census database to %1$s
Form List Path (appended to Server URL)
Severe! Channel is probably lost premanently. Try Disable/Re-Enable P2P.
Choose a form you want to start in the admin setting.
Ask to clean data from previous date
Census data clearing password successfully changed
Census data clearing password is reset to default
Tap to clear all place names and all point data
%1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Today\'s date is different from the existing database. Would you like to clear the database for new EA?

Are you sure you want to mark this point as invalid?
Are you sure you want to remove all points collected?
Are you sure you want to remove points collected in the selected dates?
Connection refused. Please tap on receive button on the other device first
The connect attempt timed out. Please try again latter
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
Mark form as finalized by default
Adds a delay to increase GPS accuracy
Sorry, a disk sync is already in progress!
Sorry, a download is already in progress!
Editing point data is not enabled in admin settings.
You should enter a numeric value for house number.
You must enter a valid number of points to select
Are you sure you want to exclude this record from the sample?
Unable to expand APK expansion files
at byte %1$d out of %2$d compressed bytes overall
Sorry, a form delete action is already in progress!

Failed: Turn on P2P and try again
Choose a form to open from the navigate module
Found using Menu button in Form Entry
House number should not start at zero.
Data from GPS is not valid. Continue saving? Accuracy %1$s m.
Invalid %1$s uri. Expecting one segment (the appName).
Sorry, invalidating census data is already in progress!

No peers found. Perform discovery by tapping connect button below.
No peers found. Turn on P2P and perform discovery by tapping connect button below.
There are no points which are farther than %1$s meters from each other.
Nothing available to display.\n\nTry getting and filling out a blank form.
Nothing available to display.\n\nTry finalizing saved forms before sending.
Nothing available to display.\n\nTry getting and filling out a blank form.
There are no valid data points to select. Please go to collect valid data points.
Sorry, you have not selected any forms!
